bibl.title: Customs Duties in Graeco-Roman Egypt.

bibl.seg: Sijpesteijn Pieter Johannes, Customs Duties in Graeco-Roman Egypt. (Studia Amstelodamensia ad epigraphicam, ius antiquum et papyrologicam pertinentia. XVII.)
Zutphen, Terra, 1987, 4°, xii-234 pp. et 9 pp. et XXII pll. I-XXII h. t.
Comprehensive study and text edition. - Pp. 102-143: List I: Customshouse receipts (Nos 1-919).
C.R. par Andréas Helmis, RD 67 (1989) pp. 293-294. - Rosario Pintaudi, BibO 49 (1992) coll. 129-131.
